item.title: Qodo teams up with Google Cloud, to provide devs with FREE AI code review tools directly within platform
item.description: The goal is to make enterprise-grade code quality solutions accessible to fast-growing startups looking to scale responsibly.

item.title: Cutting cloud waste at scale: Akamai saves 70% using AI agents orchestrated by kubernetes
item.description: Akamai needed a Kubernetes automation platform that optimized the costs of running its core infrastructure in real time on several clouds.

item.title: Inside LinkedIn’s AI overhaul: Job search powered by LLM distillation
item.description: In building its AI-powered job search, now available to all users, LinkedIn chose to distill large models and improve its understanding of queries.

item.title: MiniMax-M1 is a new open source model with 1 MILLION TOKEN context and new, hyper efficient reinforcement learning
item.description: MiniMax-M1 presents a flexible option for organizations looking to experiment with or scale up advanced AI capabilities while managing costs.

item.title: Groq just made Hugging Face way faster — and it’s coming for AWS and Google
item.description: Groq challenges AWS and Google with lightning-fast AI inference, exclusive 131k context windows, and new Hugging Face partnership to reach millions of...
